# Luano City - A Hidden Gem in the Heart of Africa.

[Smart Cities](https://www.luanocity.com/news/category/Smart+Cities)[Master-Planned Communities](https://www.luanocity.com/news/category/Master-Planned+Communities)[Real Estate Investment](https://www.luanocity.com/news/category/Real+Estate+Investment)[Residential & Commercial Properties](https://www.luanocity.com/news/category/Residential+%26+Commercial+Properties)[Modern Living](https://www.luanocity.com/news/category/Modern+Living)[Gated Communities](https://www.luanocity.com/news/category/Gated+Communities)[Expat Living in Africa](https://www.luanocity.com/news/category/Expat+Living+in+Africa)[Sustainable Housing](https://www.luanocity.com/news/category/Sustainable+Housing)[Economic Development](https://www.luanocity.com/news/category/Economic+Development)[Business Hubs in Africa](https://www.luanocity.com/news/category/Business+Hubs+in+Africa)[Remote Work & Digital Nomads](https://www.luanocity.com/news/category/Remote+Work+%26+Digital+Nomads)[Lubumbashi Business Opportunities](https://www.luanocity.com/news/category/Lubumbashi+Business+Opportunities)[Shopping & Lifestyle](https://www.luanocity.com/news/category/Shopping+%26+Lifestyle)[Mall Developments](https://www.luanocity.com/news/category/Mall+Developments)[Local Crafts & Global Brands](https://www.luanocity.com/news/category/Local+Crafts+%26+Global+Brands)[Retail Growth in Africa](https://www.luanocity.com/news/category/Retail+Growth+in+Africa)[Regional Travel Hubs](https://www.luanocity.com/news/category/Regional+Travel+Hubs)[Airport Proximity Developments](https://www.luanocity.com/news/category/Airport+Proximity+Developments)[Connectivity & Transport](https://www.luanocity.com/news/category/Connectivity+%26+Transport)[Southern Africa Travel](https://www.luanocity.com/news/category/Southern+Africa+Travel)[Green Infrastructure](https://www.luanocity.com/news/category/Green+Infrastructure)[Eco-Friendly Urban Design](https://www.luanocity.com/news/category/Eco-Friendly+Urban+Design)

Jul 28

Written By [Magdaleen Louw](https://www.luanocity.com/news?author=67a210538e06b33f531cc9e6)

### Why Luano City?

At Luano, **Live. Work. Shop. Fly.** represents an integrated urban lifestyle where residential, business, retail, and travel experiences are seamlessly connected in one smart, well-planned location. Luano City is a modern, convenient, and efficient environment that supports everyday life, productivity, leisure, and mobility — all in one place.

At Luano City, we specialize in helping you find, buy, sell, or invest in real estate on our 220-hectare site in Lubumbashi. Whether you're searching for your dream home, a rental property, or commercial space, our team of experienced agents is here to guide you through every step of the process. We prioritize your needs and strive to deliver results that exceed expectations. We also combine cutting-edge technology, sustainable infrastructure, and a focus on community. Due to its strategic location and connectivity, Luano City's development offers residents an unparalleled lifestyle experience and investment growth.

### Live: Modern Living Designed for Comfort, Security & Sustainability

Luano City offers a thoughtfully master-planned residential experience tailored to meet the needs of **families, professionals, and expats** seeking comfort, security, and convenience. From high-density to low-density housing options, the development features well-organized estates designed to accommodate different lifestyles and budgets. [**Mahogany Estate**](https://www.luanocity.com/developments/mahogany-estate), a high-density residential area, is ideal for those seeking modern living spaces with excellent connectivity to commercial hubs and transport links. For those desiring more privacy and space, [**Jacaranda Estate**](https://www.luanocity.com/developments/jacaranda-estate) and [**Frangipani Estate**](https://www.luanocity.com/developments/frangipani-estate) offer low-density housing in tranquil environments, complete with tree-lined streets and landscaped surroundings—perfect for families and professionals looking to settle in a peaceful yet connected community.

Security is a top priority in Luano City. Each estate benefits from **gated access, 24/7 surveillance**, and **dedicated community security services**, giving residents peace of mind. In addition, the city’s layout encourages a lifestyle of comfort and wellness. Residents enjoy easy access to **planned green spaces and community parks**, while **recreational facilities**—including tennis courts and swimming pools within [**Flamboyant Estate**](https://www.luanocity.com/developments/flamboyant-estate), and future amenities in [**Jacaranda Estate**](https://www.luanocity.com/developments/jacaranda-estate)—offer families and individuals opportunities to stay active and engaged without leaving their neighborhood. The community is also **strategically located near healthcare services and educational facilities**, making daily life easy and accessible for both locals and expatriates.

At the heart of Luano City’s vision is a commitment to **sustainable urban living**. The development incorporates **green building principles** such as **solar energy integration**, **efficient water systems**, and **landscaping with native vegetation** to reduce water usage. Eco-conscious design touches like **reclaimed wood**, permeable paving, and tree preservation zones help preserve the natural environment while creating a modern, livable city. These efforts not only lower the environmental impact but also enhance the beauty and long-term value of the community. In Luano City, **residential life is built around balance—between modern convenience and sustainable design, urban energy and serene living**.

### **Work: Plug into Lubumbashi’s dynamic economy**

#### **Business Hub:**

Lubumbashi, the second-largest city in the Democratic Republic of Congo, stands as a vital economic engine not only for the country but for the broader Central and Southern African region. Often referred to as the "mining capital" of the DRC, Lubumbashi is strategically located in the resource-rich Katanga province, home to some of the world’s largest reserves of copper and cobalt—critical minerals powering global technology and clean energy transitions. The city is a key hub for mining operations, processing industries, and international trade, attracting multinational corporations, logistics firms, and investors from across the globe.

#### **Proximity to Major Companies:**

Positioned just minutes from Lubumbashi International Airport and within close reach of major business districts and industrial zones, **Luano City** offers unmatched connectivity at the heart of this thriving region. Its strategic location places it at the crossroads of commerce, industry, and mobility—making it an ideal base for professionals, entrepreneurs, and companies operating in the mining and commercial sectors. As Lubumbashi continues to grow, Luano City is poised to become a catalyst for smart, sustainable urban development, designed to meet the needs of modern living and business.

#### **Remote Working Options:**

With the rise of remote work and hybrid models, staying connected has never been more essential. **Luano City** rises to the occasion by offering **high-speed internet infrastructure**, flexible **co-working spaces**, and modern office facilities designed for remote professionals and digital nomads. Whether you're a virtual consultant, tech entrepreneur, or project manager, Luano City provides an adaptable and productive environment that supports today's work styles—without sacrificing the convenience of proximity to business centers or the buzz of urban life.

#### **Local Opportunities:**

Beyond infrastructure, **Luano City opens the door to vibrant local opportunities** for **entrepreneurs**, **skilled professionals**, and **expatriates** seeking to plug into Lubumbashi’s dynamic economy. From launching a small business in a growing commercial hub to accessing professional networks, investment opportunities, and lifestyle amenities, Luano City is designed to empower talent and ambition. With a focus on safety, modern living, and sustainable growth, it's more than a development—it's a thriving community where people and ideas flourish.

### **Shop - Commercial and lifestyle anchor for the next generation**

**Luano City’s Shopping Centers:** Lubumbashi offers a vibrant and growing retail scene, from traditional markets to a new ultra-modern shopping center. In and around **Luano City**, residents and visitors can enjoy access to a wide variety of experiences. The city’s seasonal open-air markets are ideal for sourcing **local handicrafts**, **textiles**, and **artisanal goods at Ruashi Market** that reflect the rich cultural heritage of the Katanga region—from handmade baskets and wood carvings to colorful printed fabrics and jewelry crafted by local artisans.

At the other end of the retail spectrum, **Miroir Mall** in the Golf area will bring a shopping experience to one of Lubumbashi’s most affluent neighborhoods. With a mix of **local boutiques**, **cafés**, and **international retail brands**, the mall will quickly become a weekend destination for urban dwellers. Its location within an established residential area will help generate strong foot traffic and boost local economic activity.

However, the momentum is shifting east toward **Luano City**, where the soon-to-open [**Mall of Lubumbashi**](https://www.luanocity.com/developments/mall-of-lubumbashi) is positioned to become the region’s most dynamic retail and lifestyle destination. Located less than a kilometer from **Luano International Airport** and surrounded by residential, commercial, and industrial zones, this mall will serve not only Lubumbashi residents but also travelers and business professionals passing through the city.

**MM - Miroir Mall (The Golf area) VS ML - Mall of Lubumbashi (at Luano City)**

#### **Strengths**

MM - Established location, affluent catchment, modern offerings

ML - Prime airport-adjacent site, integration with residential and commercial zones, new infrastructure

#### **Weaknesses**

MM - Limited expansion space, reliant on Golf traffic

ML - Yet to open—will need to build tenant and consumer awareness

#### **Opportunities**

MM - Attract lifestyle-seeking locals and expats; boutique growth

ML - Capitalize on future city growth, serve as a regional gateway, mixed-use synergy

#### **Threats**

MM - Competition from newer developments, shopper saturation

ML - Development timeline delays, regional economic fluctuations

**Mall of Lubumbashi – A Lifestyle Destination**

What sets the [**Mall of Lubumbashi**](https://www.luanocity.com/developments/mall-of-lubumbashi) apart is its integration within the broader **Luano City master plan**. Just steps away, visitors will find expansive **green areas**, **sports facilities**, and recreational spaces—including **tennis courts** and **swimming facilities**—designed for both leisure and wellness. These elements make Luano City not just a place to shop, but a vibrant, inclusive community where people can live, work, shop and thrive.

Importantly, the [**Mall of Lubumbashi**](https://www.luanocity.com/developments/mall-of-lubumbashi) is strategically located along Lubumbashi’s **future urban sprawl**, as the city continues expanding north and east. Positioned at the gateway to this growth corridor, the mall is perfectly placed to become the **commercial and lifestyle anchor** for the next generation of Lubumbashi residents. As new neighborhoods, businesses, and industrial zones emerge in this direction, the Mall of Lubumbashi will be ideally suited to serve a rapidly growing and evolving community.

Whether you're hunting for unique Congolese craftsmanship, shopping global brands, or looking for a peaceful green escape, Luano City delivers a seamless lifestyle experience—cementing its role as Lubumbashi’s most exciting and forward-looking development.

### **FLY: A Connected Hub for Local and Regional Travel**

One of Luano City’s greatest advantages is its exceptional **accessibility**. Located just **minutes from Lubumbashi International Airport**, it offers effortless travel connections for both domestic and international visitors. Whether you're arriving for business, relocating, or planning a quick weekend getaway, Luano City puts you right at the center of it all. With direct access to major roads and growing public transportation links, getting around **Lubumbashi and its suburbs** is easy—whether by car, taxi, or future transport services designed to connect Luano City with the rest of the urban core. For private travelers, its secure, well-planned road networks offer smooth mobility in and out of the development.

But Luano City is more than just a gateway to Lubumbashi—it’s a **launchpad for regional travel**. Situated near the **Zambian border** and within driving distance of several **Southern African nations**, it’s an ideal base for professionals, tourists, and investors alike. The city’s location makes weekend trips to destinations in **Zambia, Botswana, or even South Africa** a real possibility. For business travelers, Luano City is the **perfect hub during key annual events** such as [**DRC Mining Week**](https://wearevuka.com/mining/drc-mining-week/) **in Lubumbashi** and the [**Kolwezi Business Meeting**](https://www.kbm-rdc.com/en_US), providing quick access to airports, hospitality, and meeting venues, while also offering high-end accommodations and professional spaces.

Additionally, [**Africa Mining Week in Cape Town**](https://african-miningweek.com/), one of the continent’s most influential mining and investment conferences, holds strategic importance for Luano City. As global investors, mining executives, and policymakers converge in South Africa each year, Luano City is consistently positioned as a flagship model for smart, mining-adjacent urban development in the DRC. The city’s proximity to major copper and cobalt mining operations, coupled with its integrated infrastructure and livability, makes it a focal point for investment dialogue at the event. Luano City’s presence at [**Africa Mining Week**](https://african-miningweek.com/) underscores its growing reputation as a **regional hub for sustainable growth, cross-border trade, and business innovation**.

### **Conclusion: Luano City, the Smart Choice for Life and Business in Lubumbashi**

Luano City offers a rare and well-balanced blend of modern urban living, professional opportunity, leisure, and mobility—making it an ideal base for **residents, workers, and visitors** in Lubumbashi. This master-planned development is more than just a place to live—it's a growing community designed to meet every need, from quality housing and green spaces to business infrastructure and regional connectivity.

At the heart of this vibrant hub is the [**Mall of Lubumbashi**](https://www.luanocity.com/developments/mall-of-lubumbashi), currently under construction. Once complete, it will become one of the city’s premier retail and lifestyle destinations, offering everything from shopping and dining to entertainment and co-working spaces—all within walking distance of residential estates like [**Mahogany**](https://www.luanocity.com/developments/mahogany-estate), [**Frangipani**](https://www.luanocity.com/developments/frangipani-estate), and [**Jacaranda**](https://www.luanocity.com/developments/jacaranda-estate). These exciting developments will not only enhance daily life for residents but also boost the area’s appeal as a regional commercial center.

Living in Luano City means being just minutes from **Lubumbashi International Airport**, close to major business corridors, and within reach of healthcare, schools, and recreational facilities like parks, tennis courts, and swimming areas. It also provides a convenient launch point for **weekend getaways**, **cross-border travel**, and participation in key regional events like [**DRC Mining Week**](https://wearevuka.com/mining/drc-mining-week/) and the [**Kolwezi Business Meeting**](https://www.kbm-rdc.com/en_US).

Designed with a long-term vision for **sustainability, safety, and smart growth**, Luano City is where you can **live, work, shop and fly**—all in one well-connected, future-focused community. Whether you're relocating, investing, or simply looking for a better quality of life in Lubumbashi, Luano City welcomes you to be part of its journey.

## **Luano City:**

### **Your new destination. Your new beginning. Your next move.**

* * *
